ds2.2.1:0.2_0: The reciter of the Monastic Code
ds2.2.1:1.1_0: What things have not been declared?
ds2.2.1:1.2_0: The difference between skillful qualities that are skillful and unskillful, blameworthy and blameless, inferior and superior, and those on the side of dark and bright. Their consciousness, and those that are not produced by choices and consciousness.
ds2.2.1:1.3_0: These are the qualities that are not declared.
